product_name: Outdoor Research Recess Cap - Kids' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A classic kid's baseball cap with an Outdoor Research screen print, the Kid's Recess Cap is sure to help your little one knock it out of the park. Polyester/cotton/spandex cap provides a breathable, stretch fit. Brim is stiffened with plastic and long enough to help keep UV rays off the nose and glare out of the eyes. Closeout.
short_description: A classic kid's baseball cap with an Outdoor Research screen print, the Kid's Recess Cap is sure to help your little one knock it out of the park.
